doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Md. Firoz Kabir
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Md. Firoz Kabir is a Eye Specialist in Comilla. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (ENT). He is a Professor, Ophthalmology at Cumilla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Mukti Hospital, Comilla. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Md. Firoz Kabir at Mukti Hospital, Comilla is 3pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.specialty: Eye (Retina, Glaucoma, Cataract) Specialist & Phaco Surgeon

He is a Professor & Head, Ophthalmology at Mainamoti Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Moon Hospital, Comilla. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Md. doctor.name: Dr. Sayaka Sultana
doctor.info: Dr. Sayaka Sultana is a Eye Specialist in Comilla. Her qualification is MBBS, MS (EYE-BSMMU). She is a Junior Consultant, Ophthalmology at Cumilla Medical College & Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Cumilla Medical Center Pvt. Ltd. (Tower Hospital). Practicing hour of Dr. Sayaka Sultana at Cumilla Medical Center Pvt. Ltd. (Tower Hospital) is 5pm to 7pm (Sat, Mon & Wed).
